decorations: There are many ornamental designs in this manuscript, coloured with red and green paints; e. g. foll. 3 a, 28 b, 46 a, 59 a (birds), 68 a (do.), 83 a (do.), 88 a, 89 b (birds), 90 b, 92 a, 93 a (birds) and b, 94 b (birds), 183 b, and 201 b.
colophons: Colophon The name of the scribe was Theodosius, as appears from a note (written with green paint) on fol. 32 a ܨܠ̣ܘ ܥܠ ܬܝܕܣ ܡܚ̣ܝܠܐ ܘܕܝܪܝܐ̣. ܕܟܬ̣ܒ̣ ܐܝܟ ܚܝ̣ܠܗ ܟܬ̣ܒ ܬܝܕܣ
Colophon The name of the scribe appears again on fol. 33a ܬܝܕܣ
